name: Fubrub
tag_list: iphone, android, ipad, mobile-software, apps, social-media, crowd-source
overview:
Fubrub.com is a great community of mobile App enthusiasts creating, sharing, and rubbing great new ideas for mobile Apps.

If you are an iPhone, iPad, or Android user everyone can participate in inspiring great new ideas for their devices.

For some good examples of what the community is talking about check out:

The Tiger Woods App http://bit.ly/dk2OO1

What you did last night App http://bit.ly/9JJmMp

The Shmoozar http://bit.ly/973PQR

The iSuck App http://bit.ly/d29v5F

Have Fun! For those of you who are passionate about your mobile devices, we built this for you.

Enjoy,

The Fubrub Team

P.S.> If you are interested in chatting for any reason, or perhaps potential cross-promotion. Feel free to give us a shout in that regard. We are always looking for smart strategic partnerships and good friends.

external_links.title: SXSW Finalist Team Starting Initial Promotion
